name: Corporate Business Support Solutions
overview:
Corporate Business Support Solutions CBSS offers a wide range of Job Placement Services for both IT / Non IT jobs. We are located in Bangalore and offer job placement consultant services throughout India.

Our services are availed by the clients including MNCs, corporate, professionals, industrial houses, individuals/professionals and government bodies.

At Corporate Business Support Solutions CBSS we offer wide range web designing and development services at affordable rates.
